original_title: Three new governors to be sworn in
original_body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); Three new governors will be sworn in on Wednesday (17) morning.

On Monday (15) evening, the President had taken measures to remove Northern Province Governor Jeevan Thiagarajah, Eastern Province Governor Anuradha Yahampath, and North-Western Province Governor Admiral of the Fleet Wasantha Karannagoda.
Sri Lanka to limit Cabinet Ministries to 30 and will avoid further expansion
Sri Lanka declares electricity, petroleum, and health services as essential
